sectionSubtitle: To Drive the Future of Artificial Intelligence in Chile

objectives.title: Collective Learning Network
objectives.description: Build a broad network of active members among individuals, consultants, startups, researchers, students, SMEs, public organizations, and companies to exchange AI knowledge.

objectives.title: Digital Platform
objectives.description: Develop a collaboration platform for members, integrating a talent directory, a map of sectoral needs, and a resource repository, with the goal of connecting Chile's AI ecosystem.

objectives.title: Training and Awareness
objectives.description: Implement training and awareness programs that foster understanding of ethical and inclusive AI among diverse audiences, catalyzing projects with social impact.

objectives.title: Strategic Alliances
objectives.description: Formalize strategic alliances with AI organizations in Latin America and develop a Global Network of Chilean AI Talent, fostering collaboration and knowledge exchange on a regional scale.
